articles.title: What Did the Earliest Animals Look Like? Chromosomal Clues Unearth the Origins of Animal Evolution - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Chromosome analysis resolves debate about sister group of all animals. It's comb jellies, not sponges. Researchers used a novel chromosome-based approach to reveal that comb jellies were the first lineage to diverge from the animal tree of life, preceding spo…
articles.content:

articles.title: BT will shed as many as 55,000 workers by 2030 - CNN
articles.description: BT Group is planning to slash up to 55,000 jobs in the next five to seven years as it makes greater use of technology to cut costs and simplify its business.

articles.title: Dengue on steady rise, ICMR set to conduct vaccine trial - The Indian Express
articles.description: The ICMR, the country’s apex agency for formulation, coordination and promotion of biomedical research, has tied up with two biotech companies — Panacea and Serum Institute of India (SII) — to conduct phase-III trials of their dengue vaccines.
